strings: <voice_0x01001358><se_def>Marek: Uuurgh...
<voice_0x01001359><se_def>Marek: F-Forgive me. I was coming after you when I was attacked by this dog...

<voice_0x0100135A><center>You again...
<center>You have a tiresome habit of appearing
<center>at the most inopportune moments.

<voice_0x0100135B><center>But I don't have the time
<center>to waste on the likes of you.

<voice_0x0100135C><center>Heir of the sage!
<center>Show your face and accept your fate!

<voice_0x0100135D><center>Defy me and condemn
<center>your own flesh and blood...
<center>Defy me and your son will die!

<voice_0x0100135E><se_def>Marek: Mama...! Stay inside!
If you come out, he will attack...
<voice_0x0100135F><se_def>Marek: Uurgh!
<voice_0x01001360><se_def>Marek: St-Stay inside...
<voice_0x01001361><se_low>Marta: Well, what a surprise. I come out to find the one who taunts me is a dog!
<voice_0x01001362><se_low>Marta: But you are not just a dog. I can smell it. I can smell the evil that tells me who you really are.

<voice_0x01001363><center>If you know who I am, you must know
<center>what I want. Come quietly and I promise
<center>a quick and painless demise.

<voice_0x01001364><se_low>Marta: Hah... Release him first.
Then we will talk.

<voice_0x01001365><center>You are in no position to make demands.
<center>Be quiet and come to me.

<voice_0x01001366><se_low>Marta: Oh-yo-yoy!
You reason like the monstrous beast you are.
<voice_0x01001367><se_low>Marta: Very well. I will go to you.
<Cap><leader> receives the ultimate key.
<voice_0x01001368><se_low>Marta: Farewell, my friends. Remember, together it is possible to break even an elm. Together, you can overcome even the strongest evil.

<voice_0x01001369><center>You choose wisely. In you, the blood
<center>of the sages has found a true heir.
<center>Such a pity that I must spill it...

<voice_0x0100136A><center>But there is nothing to fear.
<center>Your son will be following you before long.
<voice_0x0100136B><se_low>Marta: So that was your plan. But the scythe has hit the stone! You are wrong if you think an old babushka like me has no fire left in her!

<voice_0x0100136C><center>Gaaargh!
<center>My eyes, my eyes...!
<voice_0x0100136D><se_low>Marta: Well? You like my nook powder!?
<voice_0x0100136E><se_low>Marta: Go, Boris! Hurry!

<voice_0x0100136F><center>Graaaaargh!
<center>You! You! Yooooou!

<voice_0x01001370><center>That meddlesome old hag!
<center>Trying to cheat me of my destiny!?
<center>Argh, my eyes, my eyes...!

<voice_0x01001371><center>But now only one seal remains. Just one more...
<center>When the last heir's blood is spilt,
<center>my spirit will finally be free of this sceptre!

<voice_0x01001372><se_high>Jessica: Stop where you are!
You aren't getting away this time!
<voice_0x01001373><se_low>Yangus: Oi! You ain't gettin' off the 'ook that easy!
<voice_0x01001374><se_def>Angelo: Stop! We'll put an end to this here and now!

<voice_0x01001375><se_low>Morrie: Basta! Only a coward runs from the battle!
Come down here and fight like a man!
